statements: DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE route_id = 101 AND weather_conditions = 'Rain';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND route_id = 1000 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE congestion_level = 'High' AND weather_conditions = 'Rainy';
DELETE FROM route_info WHERE destination = 'New York';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id = 1 AND route_id = 101;
DELETE FROM route_info WHERE destination = 'New York' AND distance > 100;
DELETE FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE congestion_level > 5 AND traffic_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2023-01-01' AND incident_type = 'accident';
